title: Test Coverage
description: Schema that describes the format of the test coverage payload sent to Code Climate

covered_percent.description: Overall coverage percentage as reported by underlying coverage tool if available

covered_strength.description: Hits/Line as reporter by underlying coverage tool if available

partial.description: If the coverage reported only represents some of the total coverage (deprecated)

repo_token.description: The per-repository identifier supplied by Code Climate

run_at.description: UNIX timestamp of when coverage was processed

source_files.description: Collection of source files containing coverage data

environment.description: Information and context related to the environment where tests are run

git.description: Git data about the source code under test

ci_service.description: Build related data as reported by CI service which ran tests

source_file.description: Meta-data and coverage information for source file under test.

blob_id.description: Blob SHA as reported by git

coverage.description: Actual line by line coverage data, represented as a string for safety. A null represents not coverable, and a 0-n represents the number of times the line is covered.

name.description: Path to source file under test

pwd.description: Working directory where test reporter is executed from

rails_root.description: Root of Rails repository as reported by Rails

reporter_version.description: Version of Code Climate test reporter tool as reported by python and javascript clients

simplecov_root.description: Simplecov root as reported by Simplecov

build_url.description: URL to build on CI service

commit_sha.description: Git commit sha checked out for test

name.description: Name of CI service which ran build

pull_request.description: Number of pull request related to build if applicable

worker_id.description: For deprecated version of parallel test support

covered.description: Number of covered lines of code

missed.description: Number of uncovered lines of code
